insecure-applications.name: VeraDemo
insecure-applications.description: Sample insecure application written in Java and Javascript, showing vulnerabilities in realistic Java code.

insecure-applications.name: VeraDemoAPI
insecure-applications.description: Sample insecure application written in Javascript, showing vulnerabilities in realistic Javascript code.

insecure-applications.name: VeraDemoJava
insecure-applications.description: Sample insecure application written in Java, showing vulnerabilities in realistic Java code.

insecure-applications.name: VeraDemoDocker
insecure-applications.description: Bringing the 2 demo apps above VeraDemoJave and VeraDemoAPI together and start them within a docker environment. You will get a Java Web Application, a JavaScript node express API. a MySQL database and a vulnerable container.

insecure-applications.name: NodeGoat
insecure-applications.description: NodeGoat, built w/CircleCI, showing how to use a yaml file to scan w/Veracode.
